title: SquidBreak
prattle: You wake up locked in a deserted jail cell, completely alone. There is nothing at all in your cell, useful or otherwise. For some reason, you have a splitting headache, which you would really like to get rid of.
What do you do?

title: Callie eat the pumpkin
prattle: Wait, seriously?

title: Eat the pumpkin Callie eat it
prattle: No, like, do you not—

title: EAT THE PUMPKIN CALLIE
prattle: Alright, well if you're really going to just go right for it, then I guess I have no choice.

title: ミ:匚＞
prattle: What Pumpkin?

title: Yell for help. Maybe Marie is nearby?
prattle: Despite your bellowing, Marie casually opens the door and leaves.

title: Lie down on the floor and cry
prattle: You try to lie down on the floor and cry, but you can't seem to get comfortable, and your tears don't come very naturally at all!
It must be all this dirt lying around everywhere. You can't think of a single other reason.

title: THERE. THE PUMPKIN. CALLIE GET IT
prattle: What p—

title: Uhh I mean Callie walk like five paces backwards, then turn around, then open your mouth and slam head into ground
prattle: I beg your pardon?

title: See if you can get through the bars in squid form!
prattle: Your clumsy tentacle accidentally flies through the bars, knocking out Marie (or was it Mary?), who'd had a change of heart.
Wow, what a mess you've made. Someone really needs to keep you on a leash!

title: SHES FUCKING DEAD!?
prattle: That is not a command!

title: Yell out an apology and ask if Mary/ie is alright
prattle: She's unconcious!

title: Callie you must cry in a corner. REPENT
prattle: Again with the dirt! Something is definitely off about this place. And you're going to get to the bottom of it or your name isn't that thing that your name is.

title: What’s back ther.e. Eat that thang like the pumpkin
prattle: As you turn around for no particular reason that you can recall, you notice the door to this cell, which of course has been unlocked this whole time.

title: Super jump through the bars of the door for a stylish escape
prattle: You try to super jump through the bars, but for some reason, you just hit your head on the door. Only once you've fallen back to the ground do you look back to the other side of the room and realize that the door was obviously just reflecting the bars over there.
You've really got to get your eyes checked!

title: EAT THE PUMPKIN… IT WILL HEAL U
prattle: You're quite certain there has never been, and never will be, a pumpkin in this room!
Besides, you are much more concerned with your inexplicable headache, which has only gotten worse since hitting your head just now.

title: scream in agony and/or frustration, then maybe smile through the pain once that's out of your system
prattle: You scream so hard you topple backwards over the pumpkin. As you lie on the floor looking up, you smile through the pain.

After all, besides the searing headache that probably isn't actually as big a deal as you're making it out to be and also probably doesn't exist because you're not seeing or hearing anything unusual, you're doing great!

title: OH THE PUMPKIN EXISTS. EAT IT
prattle: You wake up next to a broken ladder. You are covered in purple ink.

title: investigate wounds
prattle: Yep, that's Callie's ink, alright. Although it has a weird smell to it... Maybe it's actually Octarian ink? Yeah, that's probably it.
In any case, it's all over you, which makes sense given she shot you with it just now. Ew, there's a bunch stuck to your shoe too!

title: Collect the ink and shape it into a new Callie
prattle: Well that didn't work. Now all you have is a big purple puddle of being sad.

title: try door
prattle: The door is locked, just like it has been all day. You're not sure why you keep expecting this to change.

title: try going through the keyhole in squid form, grate style!
prattle: Upon closer examination, you realize that isn't actually a keyhole at all. It's just drawn on the door.
It's just as well, anyway. It's got that same weird smell as Callie's ink, and you're not sure if you can deal with that right now.

title: Punch down the door!
prattle: You try to punch down the door, but you forget that this door isn't reflecting any windows and accidentally send your fist flying through the bars!
It connects with the face of a random passer-by. Keys from his key ring jangle on the floor.

title: ミ:匚＞
prattle: All this flailing around is really getting you winded! Your VIGOR NEXUS accrues one FALLEN BREATH.

title: Take a breath.
prattle: Ah, that's better. There's nothing like a big gulp of fresh air to clear your head and recover your HP. Or, well, as fresh as it gets down here, anyway.

title: A MOMENT OF YOUR TIME, PLEASE, BEFORE WE CONTINUE.
prattle: OH, SORRY, AM I INTERRUPTING SOMETHING? MY APOLOGIES. I JUST FELT IT WOULD BE VALUABLE TO CLARIFY A FEW THINGS.

title: PLEASE, DO NOT WORRY.
prattle: YOUR REGULARLY SCHEDULED 'WHIMSY' WILL CONTINUE SHORTLY. AND I AM SURE OUR ACQUAINTANCE MARIE CAN HANDLE A BRIEF INTERRUPTION.
ISN'T THAT RIGHT, MARIE? BOGGLE VACANTLY IN A VAGUELY SOUTHWESTERLY DIRECTION FOR YES.
SEE? SHE'S FINE. GET OVER YOURSELVES.

title: NOW, IF YOU WOULD KINDLY JOIN ME.
prattle: WE'LL AWAY. TO MY ROOM.
PLEASE. TAKE A MOMENT, IF YOU WOULD. TO PERUSE MY VARIOUS INTERESTS. AS IS USUAL, THEY CAN ALL BE PLAINLY SEEN WITHIN THE BOUNDS OF THIS CONVENIENT RECTANGLE.
AND, OF COURSE, ONCE YOU ARE READY, FEEL FREE TO GET COMFORTABLE. THERE IS PLENTY OF ROOM ON THE UNBELIEVABLY SHITTY BED, I ASSURE YOU.
AH, YES, THERE YOU GO. SEATED JUST OFFSCREEN, BEYOND THE TERRIBLE DIARY, A PERFECT CHOICE. YOU LOOK SO VERY... EXTANT, OVER THERE.

title: BUT ENOUGH AIMLESS FLATTERY.
prattle: YES, YOU ARE HERE FOR A REASON, AFTER ALL. AND AS DELIGHTFUL AS IT WOULD NO DOUBT BE TO WASTE EVERYONE'S TIME AND THEN LAUGH AT THEM IN A PASSIVE AGGRESSIVE MANNER. I AM NOTHING IF NOT A STRAIGHTFORWARD WOMAN.
I AM HERE TO DISCUSS MY 'ROLE' IN THIS WORK.

title: I AM NOT THE CREATOR.
prattle: AT LEAST, NOT YET.
BUT OF COURSE, I AM RELATED. YES, I CAN SEE HER OVER THERE, SKETCHING AND SCRIBBLING. IMAGINING WORLDS. ENGAGING IN 'CRAFT'.
SHE IS MY SISTER, AFTER ALL. AND YET, AS IS THE WAY OF THINGS, SHE CANNOT EXPRESS IT WHILE I AM MAKING MY PRESENCE KNOWN.

title: AND SO, I OFFERED A PROPOSAL.
prattle: I WILL MAINTAIN THIS CREATION OF HERS, IN HER ABSENCE. I WILL HELP TO REALIZE HER VISIONS IN THESE FELL TIMES.
HOWEVER, I WILL DO SO MY WAY, AND ONLY MY WAY. I AM NOT ONE TO COMPROMISE WHEN IT COMES TO THE FORM OF MY SOUL, AFTER ALL. THIS SHOULD BE OBVIOUS BY THE WAY I'M DRESSED.

title: AND THAT IS REALLY ALL THERE IS TO SAY ON THE MATTER.
prattle: MY PRESENCE WILL BE KNOWN IN THE GARB OF THIS WEBSITE, OF COURSE. AND IN MY PARTICULAR. QUITE LEGALLY DISTINCT MANNER. OF SPEECH.
BUT BEYOND THAT, IT WILL BE MORE OR LESS IRRELEVANT TO YOU. WHICH IS WHY I HAVE CHOSEN TO PUT THIS LEVEL OF EFFORT. INTO TELLING YOU WHY THE WEBSITE IS PINK SOMETIMES.

title: THAT BEING SAID, I BID YOU ADIEU.
prattle: WHICH IS FRENCH FOR 'THE NEXT PAGE IS NORMAL. INSTEAD OF BEING ANNOYING.'

title: Try fixing the ladder?
prattle: AS THERE IS NOTHING AROUND WITH WHICH TO 'FIX' THE 'LADDER', YOU JUST SORT OF END UP WRESTLING IT FOR A BIT. IT'S KIND OF UNCOMFORTABLE TO WATCH.
YOU WILL HAVE TO BE MORE CREATIVE THAN THAT IF YOU WISH TO SOLVE MY MAZE. YOU WILL HAVE TO ENGAGE IN TOOL USE, AND SUFFERING. THIS IS THE WAY OF THINGS.

title: Lie on the ground and cry a little.
prattle: For no reason in particular, you feel as if your next step should be to 'engage in suffering'.
So, you lay down on the floor and cry, adding some flailing and squealing for good measure.

title: ミ:匚＞
prattle: You accidentally splash some tears on your INVISIBLE HAMMER. Thankfully, it's still intact, even though it smells kind of weird.
Your PULSE WIDTH SIFTULATOR revs into action!

title: SMASH THE DOOR WITH HAMMER
prattle: The hammer doesn't do much good against the metal door, but damn if it doesn't feel good to smack it anyway. Your VIGOR NEXUS is going wild!
Which is a bad thing, actually. You're not sure why you thought about it like it was a good thing just now? But you should probably stop banging, though.
You should probably. You should. Stop banging. Marie. Marie stop it. Stop. Stop it. Stop it! Stop it! STO—

title: ミ:匚＞
prattle: You eventually uselessly bang on the door for so long that you miss the door and hit the doorknob instead. It goes flying off, and so does your hammer. And would you look at that, all the tears fell off of it, too, what a shame. Guess it's not going to appear onscreen anymore.
It's fine though. Your OVATION SCORE is still just barely in excess of your AUTHORITATION INDEX, and your HP didn't hit zero. You really cut it close there!
You slot the DOORKNOB into your INVENTORIUM.

title: Ink the walls and swim up them!
prattle: YOU WOULD LOVE TO COAT THE WALLS IN INK. YOU WOULD JUST FUCKING ADORE THAT. HOWEVER, YOU POSESS NO DEVICE WITH WHICH TO DO SO, WHICH IS KIND OF GOING TO BE A MASSIVE PROBLEM FOR THAT IDEA.
IT'S A SHAME, TOO, GIVEN THE INK TANK YOU JUST OBTAINED. BUT ALAS, EVERYONE KNOWS IT IS NOT POSSIBLE TO EXTRACT INK FROM A TANK WITHOUT A TURF MODUS. IF ONLY THERE WERE ONE IN YOUR CELL.

title: Flop your squid form at the wall until some ink sticks.
prattle: YOU FLAIL USELESSLY AGAINST THE WALL, THANKFULLY AVOIDING ANY GREIVOUS INJURIES BUT NONTHELESS WREAKING HAVOC ON YOUR STUPID STATS BAR THING. YOUR HP IS STEADILY LOWERING, AND THE OTHER ONES ARE DOING CONCERNING THINGS AS WELL.
UNFORTUNATELY, MUCH AS YOU SMASH AND SPIT AND ATTEMPT TO SIMPLY CLIMB THIS WALL, IT STRANGELY ENOUGH SEEMS AS IF IT IS NOT POSSIBLE TO EXTRACT INK FROM A TANK WITHOUT A TURF MODUS.

YOU HEAR THE OTHER ONE YELLING SOMETHING ABOUT A KEY. SHE'S PROBABLY SAYING HER CLASSIC CATCHPHRASE, 'DON'T FORGET THAT YOUR TURF MODUS IS THE KEY TO VICTORY'. SHE ALWAYS USED TO SAY THAT WHEN YOU WERE KIDS.

title: Smash the ink tank against the wall.
prattle: YOU REPEATEDLY BANG THE DOORKNOB INTO THE WALL FOR SOME REASON, REACHING A NEW ECHELON OF USELESS FLAILING IN THE PROCESS.
SERIOUSLY, YOUR MAGIC ARBITRARY STATISTICS KOWTOWOMETER HASN'T EVEN BOTHERED TO ESCALATE BEYOND ITS CURRENT STATUS OF HYPER-CRITICAL DEATHCON II. THAT'S HOW USELESS YOU'RE BEING.

HM? NO, THOSE AREN'T MY WORDS. THAT'S JUST WHAT THE OTHER ONE IS SAYING. THAT, AND CONSTANTLY SCREAMING HER CATCHPHRASE, OF COURSE, BUT THAT'S JUST SORT OF FADED INTO THE BACKGROUND RADIATION AT THIS POINT.

title: Toss the key up to Callie!
prattle: THE ROTATION MODUS IS FAR TOO HEAVY TO THROW THAT KIND OF DISTANCE. ESPECIALLY NOT IN YOUR CURRENT CONDITION.

title: Paint the wall with the rotation modus and squid surge up to callie!
prattle: YOU USE THE KEY TO UNLOCK THE DOORKNOB.

title: ミ:匚＞
prattle: NOW THAT YOUR INK TANK HAS BEEN CONNECTED TO YOUR ROTATION MODUS, YOU'RE FINALLY ABLE TO PAINT THINGS. UNFORTUNATELY, THE ROTATION MODUS DOESN'T QUITE HAVE THE REACH TO GET TO THE OTHER ONE WHEN SHE'S ALL THE WAY UP THERE.
ALSO, THE AIR THING STILL APPEARS TO BE IN PRETTY TERRIBLE SHAPE, DRAINING YOUR HP TO YET MORE DANGEROUS LEVELS. THAT'S PROBABLY WHY YOUR THOUGHTS FEEL LIKE SUCH A STRUGGLE AT THE MOMENT.

title: Take a deep breath?
prattle: YOU TAKE A DEEP BREATH.

title: ミ:匚＞
prattle: NOW THAT YOU FINALLY HAVE YOUR HEAD TOGETHER, YOU REMEMEBER ABOUT HOW KEYS CAN, IN FACT, BE TURNED SIDEWAYS.
YOU'RE NOT SURE HOW YOU FORGOT ABOUT THIS. THE DEPTH OF YOUR UTTER INCAPACITY ASTOUNDS YOU. THANK FUCKING SQUID COD YOU HAVE ME HERE TO HELP.

title: Ink a line up the wall with a vert!
prattle: You FLIP your ROTATION MODUS TURN WAYS and cover the wall with a long line of ink! A little too long, in fact. You seem to have smacked Big Cal right in the face, and she's furious!
You're no good with this thing, really. You should probably just give it to someone who can actually use it.

title: Swim up and give the roller to Callie!
prattle: FINALLY. AFTER ALL THIS FUCKING AROUND. IT IS GO TIME.

title: ミ:匚＞
prattle: YOU BONK YOUR HEAD ON THE BOTTOM OF THE WINDOW. LIKE A FUCKING SQUID. HOW DEEPLY IRONIC.

title: ミ:匚＞
prattle: AND OF COURSE, DUE TO YOUR OBNOXIOUS AMOUNT OF MOMENTUM, THE KEY GOES FLYING.
DOES CALLIE MANAGE TO SNATCH IT? NO, OF COURSE SHE DOESN'T. HER HP MUST BE TOO LOW, OR SOME OTHER CRAB-SHIT LIKE THAT.
INSTEAD, AS IS USUAL, AN ANNOYING FUCKHEAD INTERRUPTS US, TAKING THE KEY FOR HIMSELF.

title: ミ:匚＞
prattle: YOU FALL. AND AS IF THE SITUATION COULDN'T GET ANY WORSE, YOU ACCIDENTALLY UNPLUG THE WINDOW BY BUMPING THE CORD THAT HAS BEEN IN PLAIN SIGHT THIS WHOLE TIME.

title: ミ:匚＞
prattle: ALL YOU CAN SEE AS YOU HELPLESSLY TUMBLE IS BIG CAL SLOWLY FADING AWAY.
AND THEN...

title: ミ:匚＞
prattle: You're unconcious!

title: stop being unconscious
prattle: YOU STOP BEING UNCONCIOUS. WOW, WHAT A HIT THAT WAS. THAT AGENT SURE PACKS A PUNCH, YOU THINK TO YOURSELF.
OH WELL, THAT'S FINE. NOW YOU CAN GET BACK TO DOING WHATEVER THAT THING YOU WERE DOING WAS. I'M SURE YOU REMEMBER.

title: Uh remember your name?
prattle: FUCK. OKAY, SURE. RIGHT. UM. YOU WANT TO SAY IT WAS. ANNOYING FUCKHEAD?
NO, THAT'S STUPID. OBVIOUSLY IT'S ACUTALLY. UH. YEAH, NAMES ARE USUALLY SOMETHING THAT YOU WOULD...
OKAY, FUCK THIS. YOU'LL FIGURE IT OUT LATER. YOU CAN JUST COME UP WITH A TEMPORARY NAME FOR NOW. IF YOU REALLY WANT TO.

title: make it callie. or callie 2.0
prattle: YOU DECIDE TO GO WITH "LIL' CAL", AFTER YOUR LATE GRANDFATHER. MAY COD REST HIS SOUL.

title: Inspect the keys on the ground and identify each one.
prattle: Hm, alright, let's see...

title: ミ:匚＞
prattle: Well, first of all we have the KEY. Nothing at all wrong with it. It's a beloved classic in these parts!
Wherever 'these parts' are, anyway. You're having trouble remembering for some reason.

title: ミ:匚＞
prattle: Then, there's the FUN KEY. The less said about this one, the better.

title: ミ:匚＞
prattle: There's the UNBELIEVABLY SHITTY DRAWING OF A KEY you apparently did in your sleep...

title: ミ:匚＞
prattle: The OCTAKA MODUS...

title: ミ:匚＞
prattle: And last but far from least, there's the MOTHER KEY, which rules over all KEYS below level 13! What a find!
Either that, or it's a JELLY DONUT you stepped on earlier. It's hard to tell from this angle.

title: Eat the Pumpkin Cal
prattle: YOU ARE UNSURE WHY YOU THOUGHT IT WOULD BE A GOOD IDEA TO TRY EATING THIS CARDBOARD CUTOUT OF A PUMPKIN, BUT IT TASTES FUCKING AWFUL. YOU HAVE NO IDEA WHY THAT OTHER AGENT APPARENTLY LIKES THESE THINGS SO MUCH.

title: Eat the cardboard cutout, it's nutritious
prattle: IT'S NOT.

title: Calcalcalcalcal how about...you use the key on the door
prattle: HM. THAT'S NOT USUAL. YOU'RE PRETTY SURE THAT YOUR THE KEY WAS SUPPOSED TO OPEN THIS DOOR. ALTHOUGH YOU'RE NOT PARTICULARLY SURE IF YOU WERE INTENDING TO DO THAT OR NOT.
IN ANY CASE, IT'S NOT WORKING. THE PRISONER (YOU THINK HER NAME WAS MARY OR SOMETHING) MUST HAVE BROKEN OFF THE DOORKNOB FROM THE INSIDE, RENDERING THE DOOR INOPERABLE.

title: SING
prattle: You start screeching some random CACOPHONIC INTONEMENTS for some reason, which accomplishes nothing, obviously. You can't even hear them properly.

They are wreaking (reeking?) havoc on your PULSE WIDTH SIFTULATOR, though, as you can quite plainly see, which is not helping your pitiful HP level or your treacherously descendant OVATION SCORE. Perhaps you should just never do that ever again? I don't know, just a thought.

title: Think about a happy memory?
prattle: No matter how hard you try, you just can't seem to summon anything! This is really starting to piss you off. Why won't your memory just work? It's as if it's being inhibited somehow.
Oh well, no use prying, right? Right?

title: ミ:匚＞
prattle: Ugh, of course. Okay, you keep trying for some reason even though we've well established at this point that there is NO POINT in doing so.
Come on, you're swimming up the WRONG TREE here, okay? Just stop it.
Stop it. Stop it! Stop it! STO—

title: ミ:匚＞
prattle: Someone is messaging you on ﾄﾑ抄��.

content.message: I SERIOUSLY CANNOT BELIEVE HOW THOROUGHLY YOU HAVE FUCKED EVERYTHING UP.
OF EVERYWHERE YOU COULD HAVE CHOSEN, YOU WENT WITH THAT CELL? ARE YOU FUCKING SQUIDDING ME?
Augh alright I get it!
You don't have to be so mean...
EVIDENTLY I DO, THOUGH!
Look, I'm sorry, okay?
I should've known better. I guess I get sloppy when it comes to her.
But I'll make up for it, okay?
UGH... fine.
Look, we still have a chance to fix this. We'll have to be quick, and it's a bit unpredictable, but there's still time to pull it off.
You're still in the area, right?
Yeah I'm hiding out.
I don't think anyone's noticed yet.
Alright, good.
I'll give you all the time I can from up here.
And I can handle that other guy if he shows up.
But you have to be the one to recover Agent Two, alright?
I'll... do my best.
You'd better. All our ink sacs are on the line here.
SO DON'T YOU DARE FUCK THIS UP AGAIN.
Of course.

title: ミ:匚＞
prattle: Well that wasn't a very pleasant memory. Or really much of a memory at all. But damn if you didn't just see it. So... good job?

Anyway, your VIGOR NEXUS is completely fucked, and your hearts are absolutely racing each other, as you can plainly tell from your PULSE WIDTH SIFTULATOR. Maybe you should just sit down and stop thinking about any of this.

title: Reach for hypnoshades over your eyes.
prattle: OH FUCK. YOU TOTALLY FORGOT ABOUT THAT WHOLE THING.
YEAH, ITS DEFINITELY A GOOD IDEA TO DO A THOROUGH HORRORS CHECK EVERY NOW AND AGAIN. AND YOU WILL BE THOROUGH, YOU ASSURE YOU.

title: ミ:匚＞
prattle: YOU GO WHOLE HOG SUCKER ON IT.

YEAH, YOU'VE BEEN AROUND THE BLOCK WITH THESE LITTLE FUCKERS, AND QUITE FRANKLY, YOU'RE SICK OF THEIR CRAB-SHIT BY NOW. OH THEY'VE GOT SO MANY TRICKS DON'T THEY. OH NO THEY CAN FUCK WITH YOUR MIND. WELL MAYBE THEY SHOULD SHUT THE FUCK UP.

SO NO, YOU TELL YOURSELF, THERE WILL BE NO 'OH I TOOK OFF THE SHADES BUT THEY WERE STILL ON ACTUALLY', NO 'BUT IT'S SO DARN PRETTY', NO 'GOSH ISN'T THIS BETTER THAN MY BAD LIFE FROM THE BEFORE TIME', NO NOTHING. THERE WILL IN FACT BE NO FUCKSHITTERY OF ANY SORT. THERE WILL BE ONLY VICTORY. SWEET, SWEET VICTORY.

title: ミ:匚＞
prattle: OKAY YEAH YOUR EYES AND MOUTH ARE TOTALLY CLEAR. NOT ONLY THAT, THE REASSURANCE HAS GOTTEN YOU TO CHILL THE FUCK OUT A LITTLE.
VICTORY.

title: Hey Narrator, can we go back to Callie?
prattle: You're not particularly sure who this 'Narrator' fellow is (though they're surely a talented and beautiful individual), but sure, we can go back to Callie.
Only problem is, you'll have to find her first.

title: ミ:匚＞
prattle: Judging by the position of her window in Mary's cell, she's probably off in this direction. Plus, it looks like there's a bunch of other EXCITING DISTACTIONS to interact with along the way! What fun!

title: Hey narrator can we go to a fun new character
prattle: You're not particularly sure who this 'Narrator' fellow is (surely a talented and beautiful individual), but sure, we can go meet a fun new character.
Only problem is, you'll have to find them first.

title: ミ:匚＞
prattle: Judging by the position of Mary's cell, something completely unrelated to anything would probably be in this direction. Plus, it looks like there's a bunch of other EXCITING DISTACTIONS to interact with along the way! What fun!

title: ミ:匚＞
prattle: Oh my, looks like you're at something of an impasse! So many exciting HIJINX to strive for, and probably a relatively small amount of time in which to attain them! All this free choice and decision making is really giving you a headache. You should probably choose quickly before you explode or something annoying like that.

title: CALLIE!!! go Callie. At least thats my vote
prattle: YOU RETRIEVE YOUR KEYS OFF THE GROUND BEFORE PROCEEDING TO MAKE THE OBVIOUS CHOICE, UTTERLY UNAWARE OF ANY EXTREMELY ANNOYING TIMELINE BIFURCATION CRAB-SHIT THAT MAY OR MAY NOT HAVE JUST OCCURED. YOU LIVE IN UNIVERSE ALPHA, OF COURSE, WHICH IS THE ONLY ONE THAT HAS EVER EXISTED.
ON THE WAY, YOU CAN'T HELP BUT NOTICE THE SUNSET GLEAMING THROUGH THE WINDOW. AH, SO BEAUTIFUL. WHAT A PRIVILEGE IT IS TO BASK AND TO EXPERIENCE LIFE. LIFE, LAUGHTER, AND MOST OF ALL, LOVE.

(Hi everyone, it's Lexi here. I'm sneaking this into the page while my sister isn't looking! Wow, this universe, the only one which has ever existed, sure is great, huh? You wanna direct your commands to this one, right? Well, if you want to do so, just preface your commands with 'UA:'! Woweee!)

title: go check out the shadowy ominous glowing red eyed figure
prattle: YOU RETRIEVE YOUR KEYS OFF THE GROUND BEFORE PROCEEDING TO MAKE THE OBVIOUS CHOICE, UTTERLY UNAWARE OF ANY EXTREMELY ANNOYING TIMELINE BIFURCATION CRAB-SHIT THAT MAY OR MAY NOT HAVE JUST OCCURED. YOU LIVE IN UNIVERSE BRAVO, OF COURSE, WHICH IS THE ONLY ONE THAT HAS EVER EXISTED.
WOW, THAT REPRESENTATION OF ASSORTED HORROR THERE SURE IS FUCKING TERRIFYING. YOU CAN'T IMAGINE WHAT IT WOULD BE LIKE TO BE AFFLICTED WITH WHATEVER HAPPENED TO THAT GUY.

(Hi everyone, it's Lexi here. I'm sneaking this into the page while my sister isn't looking! Wow, this universe, the only one which has ever existed, sure is great, huh? You wanna direct your commands to this one, right? Well, if you want to do so, just preface your commands with 'UB:'! Woweee!)

title: UA: Go more towards Callie! Ignore the light...
prattle: YOU KNOW WHAT, YOU'RE RIGHT. FUCK THE LIGHT, OF THE SUN AND THE SURFACE, ACTUALLY. YOU'RE SICK OF ITS SHIT.
IN FACT, YOU KNOW WHAT? YOU UNPLUG THE WINDOW. YOU'VE DECIDED IT CAN GO FUCK ITSELF OFF ENTIRELY.
YEAH, THAT'S RIGHT, YOU THINK TOWARDS THE CONCEPT OF FREEDOM. GO AHEAD AND SLOWLY FADE AWAY OVER A PERIOD OF ROUGHLY FIVE SECONDS, YOU CONTINUE. SEE IF YOU CARE.

title: UB: wave enthusiastically and say hello to the horrors
prattle: YOU WAVE ENTHUSIASTICALLY TOWARDS THE HORRORS. YOU SAY HELLO.
THEY SAY HELLO BACK. FETID WHISPERS, CLINGING TO YOUR SOUL.
IT'S PROBABLY FINE. THOUGH FOR NO REASON IN PARTICULAR IT SEEMS LIKE A REALLY GOOD IDEA TO DO LITERALLY ANYTHING ELSE.

title: UB: ask the horrors for help taking the cover off the vent
prattle: YOU COMMUNE WITH TERRIBLE THINGS FROM BEYOND THE VEIL AND ASK THEM FOR HELP TAKING THE COVER OFF A VENT.

THEIR RESPONSE IS FRAGMENTARY AND BEYOND ALL COMPREHENSION, BUT THE WEAK PERCEPTION OF YOUR MORTAL MIND IS JUST BARELY ABLE TO MAKE OUT SOMETHING. ENCROACHING WHISPERS, ENDLESS SPIRIT, WITHOUT ANY EXPRESSION THAT CAPTURES ITS TRUE INTENSITY. TO YOUR UNTRAINED EARS, IT SORT OF SOUNDS LIKE SOMEONE IS SCREAMING 'YOU ARE MADE OF INK DIPSHIT'.
THE MEANING OF THESE WORDS WILL BE DEBATED FOR GENERATIONS TO COME.

title: UB: start crying and then enter the vent in swim form
prattle: You let out a few TEARS OF SHAME at the cruel words of THE HORRORS, putting them to good use by greasing the floor under the vent.
Then, you activate your SPECIAL RECONFICURATION: 'SWIM MODE' in order to liquify yourself and squeeze through. The motion comes naturally to you, as does your form.

title: UB: ミ:匚＞
prattle: On the other side, there's a strange dark room with a RECONSTITUTION POOL at its center, in addition to a few other INDICATIVE TRINKETS.

title: UB: Put the Marie plush in your mouth.
prattle: WOW, OKAY, I GUESS ONE OF YOUR CHARACTER TRAITS IS BITING THINGS. GREAT TO KNOW. AND NICE JOB SLOBBERING ALL OVER THAT AGENT TWO PLUSH BY THE WAY, GENIUS. HOPE YOU'RE HAVING AS MUCH FUN AS I AM.

title: UB: Throw Marie plushie into Reconstitution Pool
prattle: OKAY YOU'RE PRETTY DAMN SURE HER NAME WAS ACUTALLY MARY, BUT WHATEVER. WHO CARES.
YOU SPIT THE THING OUT INTO THE RECONSTITUTION POOL. THROUGH MEANS INEXPLICABLE TO EVEN OUR MOST TALENTED RESEARCHERS, IT MANAGES TO SPONTANEOUSLY AND CONTINUOUSLY RECONSTITUTE. AS ITSELF.
TRULY, A MIRACLE HAS BEEN BORNE TODAY.

title: UB: Throw Marie plushie into Reconstitution Pool
prattle: UH OKAY YOU DO THAT WHOLE THING AGAIN I GUESS. SURE, WHY NOT AT THIS POINT. I WONDER WHAT UNIVERSE ALPHA YOU IS UP TO. YOU KNOW, THE ONE THAT DOESN'T EXIST? I BET THEY'RE MAKING SO MUCH PROGRESS TOWARDS WHATEVER THAT THING THEY WANTED TO DO WAS.

title: UA: GO MORE TO CALLIE
prattle: YOU TRY TO CLIMB THE STAIRS AND OH MY FUCKING COD WHAT KIND OF CRAB-SHIT IS THIS.
OKAY LOOKS LIKE THE STAIRS ARE ACTUALLY SOME KIND OF ELABORATE ANTIPATHIC RUNWAY SUBSUMIFICATOR FOR SOME CODDAMN REASON. COOL GREAT TO SEE.
YOU CAN SEE ECHOES OF THE BEAUTIFUL LIGHT OF THE BELOVED SKY UP THERE, BUT BESIDES THAT NOTHING'S DOING.

title: UA: imagine her in your head
prattle: DEJECTED BY THE REVELATION AND STRUGGLING TO THINK OF ANY OTHER POSSIBILITIES, YOU SETTLE FOR IMAGINING THE OTHER ONE IN YOUR HEAD.
AH, THERE SHE IS. PICTURE PERFECT, BASICALLY THE SAME AS THE REAL THING, PROBABLY. IT'S KIND OF HARD TO SAY AT THIS POINT.

title: UA: Go to her. Fight the homophobic hogwarts stairs
prattle: OH WOW, FUCK. JUST TRY HARDER? WISH I'D THOUGHT OF THAT.
AND YET, TRY AS YOU MIGHT, IT WOULD SEEM THAT THE HOG SUCK STAIR CASE JUST TRIES HARDER. IT SOMEHOW FEELS AS IF YOU EXIST IN A WORLD COMPRISED PRIMARILY OF WEIRD PUZZLE SHIT.

ALL YOU END UP ACCOMPLISHING IS FREAKING YOURSELF THE FUCK OUT. THAT, AND WHATEVER THE PURPLE ONE WAS SUPPOSED TO BE. OR MAYBE THAT'S JUST A COINCIDENCE? EVEN I'M HAVING TROUBLE TELLING AT THIS POINT.

title: UA: paint the wall with whatever weapon you're carrying and swim up past the stairs
prattle: OH RIGHT, THAT THING. WELL, YOU SUPPOSE THE OCTAKA MODUS COULD BE USED FOR SUCH A THING, BUT IT UNFORTUNATELY SEEMS TO BE LACKING ITS INK TANK. AND, AS WE ALL KNOW, IT IS IMPOSSIBLE TO COVER TURF FROM A MODUS WITHOUT AN INK TANK. IF ONLY YOU KNEW OF A WAY TO GET ONE.

title: UA: say can you maybe uh push your hair up a bit? Lets see that forehead
prattle: UH, OKAY, YOU'RE KIND OF SENSITIVE ABOUT YOUR FOREHEAD BUT SURE, YOU'RE THE BOSS YOU GUESS.
THERE'S NOT REALLY MUCH TO SEE, THOUGH. IT'S KIND OF BORING. YOUR HAIR AND ITS UNBELIEVABLY SHITTY RENDERING ARE KIND OF MORE INTERESTING TO BE HONEST. FROM A SCIENTIFIC STANDPOINT.

title: UA: OH MY GOSH YOUR SO CUTE AWHHH OMG CUTIE
prattle: That is not a command!

title: UA: you have a cute forehead
UA: you have an ugly forehead
UA: ミ:匚＞
prattle: Oh hey looks like someone left their INVISIBLE HAMMER lying around isn't that novel.
You suppose your COPIOUS DEGREE OF SUFFERING must have revealed it to you once more! That or it just sort of showed up. What's the difference, am I right?
So let's not even TRY to think of WHO would leave their INVISIBLE HAMMER just lying around like that, okay? You have it now. Let's just forget this whole thing ever happened.

title: UB: Check out what's on that laptop.
prattle: YOU HAVE A SEAT AND PREPARE TO FIGURE OUT WHAT'S ON THIS MYSTERIOUS LAPTOP, WHICH YOU HAVE NEVER SEEN BEFORE IN YOUR LIFE.

title: UB: ミ:匚＞
prattle: AH, WELL, FUCK THAT, YOU GUESS. THE THING'S LOCKED, AS YOU CAN QUITE PLAINLY SEE, AND YOU HAVE NO IDEA WHAT THE PASSWORD IS. WHAT A SHAME. LOOKS LIKE YOU'LL HAVE TO GO DO SOMETHING ELSE.

title: UB: jump in the pool
prattle: YOU BECOME YOUR SWIMMING-TYPE FORM AND ENTER THE RECONSTITUTION POOL. IT'S SO LOVELY HERE, JUST RELAXING INSIDE MATCHING INK ALONGSIDE THE MARY PLUSHIE. YOU FEEL AS IF YOU COULD SPEND AN INDEFINITE PERIOD OF TIME HERE. YOU PROBABLY SHOULD.
WHAT? WHO SAID THAT? CERTAINLY NOTHING UNUSUAL. JUST RELAX. JUST DON'T GET ANY IDEAS.

title: UB: Open the northeast door.
prattle: AND YET, DESPITE THE DESPERATE INSISTENCE OF ALL THAT IS REASONABLE AND NOT ANNOYING BETWEEN YOUR EARS, YOU DECIDE TO OPEN THE DOOR.
BRIGHT, BEAUTEOUS LIGHT GLEAMS FROM ITS APERTURE, BECKONING YOU FORWARD. YOU WONDER, FOR SOME CODFORSAKEN REASON, JUST WHAT IT IS YOU WILL FIND ON THE OTHER END.
AND SO, OF COURSE, YOU CAPITULATE TO THIS 'WONDER' AND PROCEED. THERE IS LITTLE CHOICE IN THE MATTER.

title: UB: ミ:匚＞
prattle: THEN, ON THE OTHER SIDE, YOU BECOME A SHOCKING REVELATION. IN EVERY SENSE OF THE WORD.
SO. THAT'S THAT. I SUPPOSE WE MUST MOVE ON. WHAT SORTS OF 'EVENTS' DID YOU HAVE PLANNED NEXT? PLEASE, GO ON. THE WORLD, AS THEY SAY, IS YOUR OYSTER.

title: UB: go into the labeled door
prattle: You go to open the door, but before you can do so, you're stopped by the sound of MYSTERIOUS DIALOGUE. It seems like it's coming from just outside!

title: UB: ミ:匚＞
prattle: Curious, you decide to eavesdrop a bit.

content.message: Okay so first of all, TO isn't even real Octotronica.
Oh my cod, are you an ACTUAL hatchling?
Who cares what is and isn't REAL? Nothing is REAL!
If nothing is real then where is it?
I don't see it anywhere.
UGH! You are the WORST!
I can't BELIEVE they keep putting us together on guard duty.
Yeah, feeling's mutual. Too bad no one cares.
We're gonna be here for the next forever either way. So get used to it and maybe be less annoying.
GRRRRRRAUUGGHHHH you know what, you're right.
*sigh*
Uh... I dunno, what do you think they're doing in there?
Probably something above our paygrade. No reason to concern ourselves with it.
Something comes out that door, we shoot it. Simple.
Ugh, fine.
I'm right behind you. Even though you suck super bad.
Glad we're on the same page.

title: UB: ミ:匚＞
prattle: Well, looks like you aren't getting out of here anytime soon! That's fine, though, probably. There's still plenty of fun INTRICATIONS to explore!
Plus, the raw sense of HARANGUED PREDEJECTION is causing your HP to trend mercifully upwards! It's all upside when you really think about it!

title: UA: jump over the stairs
prattle: IT GOES ABOUT AS WELL AS YOU'D EXPECT. YOU SUPPOSE YOU AT LEAST GOT A LITTLE CLOSER TO THAT SOURCE OF THE VIBRANT AND BEAUTIFUL LIGHT OF LOVE UP THERE, THOUGH. BUT IT KIND OF JUST MAKES YOU FEEL WORSE.
YOUR INK-COATED HAMMER RATTLES AROUND IN YOUR INVENTORIUM, YET ANOTHER VICTIM TO YOUR LATEST PRATFALL.

title: UA: smear ink on the wall with the hammer and swim up the resulting trail
prattle: That's a great idea! Unfortunately, though, the INVISIBLE HAMMER can only hold onto so much ink. Your trail has barely extended from its head before it meets an untimely end.

You slot the INVISIBLE HAMMER into your INVENTORIUM, lamenting the failure. Your OCTAKA MODUS is jangling at your side, and there's all this perfectly good ink just right sitting there inside your INK LAYER! There's gotta be some way to bridge the gap.

title: Plug that outlet in please
prattle: YOU PLUG THE OUTLET INTO THE WINDOW.

AND THEN, AS IF BY MAGIC, YOU ARE BESET ONCE MORE. BY THE BEAUTY OF THE SUN. SO LOVELY, SO WONDROUS, SO PRESENT. THE SHEER RESTITUDE BRINGS A TEAR TO YOUR EYE, PROBABLY. YOU DON'T REALLY FEEL LIKE CHECKING RIGHT NOW.

title: Plug that outlet in please
prattle: YOU WOULD LOVE TO DO THAT. EXCEPT THAT WHAT THE FUCK ARE YOU TALKING ABOUT.
DID YOU MEAN THE OUTLET THAT HAS BEEN IN PLAIN VIEW NEXT TO THAT VENT THIS ENTIRE TIME? BECAUSE THAT'S BEING USED. BY THE VENT.
SERIOUSLY, DID YOU WASH IN FROM SOME PARALLEL UNIVERSE OR SOMETHING? BECAUSE OH MY FUCKING COD THERE HAD BETTER NOT BE ANOTHER ONE OF THOSE TO CLEAN UP. THIS IS HARD ENOUGH TO MANAGE AS IT IS.

title: UA: Go through window
prattle: You climb up into the WINDOW, careful to change into your SWIM-TYPE FORM in order to ease your journey SUNWARDS.

title: UA: ミ:匚＞
prattle: You emerge from the face of some sort of WHIMSIFIED RECEPTACLE, to which the window seems to have been mounted, and discover that the sunset was, of course, just an image on a screen.

Not that you expected anything different. I mean, what, did you think there was just gonna be a path straight to the ACTUAL SURFACE down here? Please. If we had that, we wouldn't even be bothering with this WHOLE MESS, right? Not that you'd know anything about that. Not that you should.
Anyway, you hear some noises in THAT OTHER LANGUAGE just across the way. Probably something about BIG CAL or whatever her name was.

title: UA: go to big cal!
prattle: YOU DECIDE TO THROW CAUTION TO THE WIND. AND CHASE AFTER THE OTHER ONE WITH ALL THE RECKLESS FUROR YOUR SMALL INKFISH BODY IS CAPABLE OF GENERATING. AFTER ALL. HOW HARD COULD IT BE. TO ACE AN EIGHT METER LONG JUMP IN WALK FORM. FROM AN EIGHTY STORY BUILDING. TO ANOTHER EIGHTY STORY BUILDING.
TURNS OUT IT'S PRETTY HARD. AND SO YOU PLUMMET TO YOUR DOOM IN COMICAL FASHION. BUT IF IT'S ANY CONSOLATION. YOUR DOOM AT LEAST MEANS THERE WILL BE NO UNIVERSE CHARLIE.
NOBODY WANTS A UNIVERSE CHARLIE.
くコ:彡 GO BACK

title: UA: DO NOT.
prattle: YOU TAKE A MOMENT TO CONSIDER THAT TRYING TO MAKE A JUMP LIKE THAT WOULD PROBABLY GET YOU KILLED HORRIBLY. AT LEAST, IF YOU JUST RUN AND JUMP AT IT.

AH, YES, YOU THINK TO YOURSELF. THIS IS WHAT YOU ARE TALKING ABOUT. THIS IS THE KIND OF SMARTNESS AND INTUITIVITION THAT HAS ENABLED YOU TO SO FIRMLY CLASP YOUR JAGGED, HORRIBLE FINGERS AROUND WHAT CAN ONLY BE REFERRED TO AS THE ALPHA TIMELINE. YOU FEEL TRULY, TRULY PROUD.
ANYWAY, YOU CAN PROBABLY JUST GET OVER THERE BY SHOOTING SOME INK OR SOMETHING. SHOULDN'T BE TOO MUCH MORE WEIRD PUZZLE SHIT LEFT AFTER THAT.

title: UA: Jagged horrible fingers? Wait, look at your fingers, do you have inkling french fry fingers?
prattle: OKAY. FIRST OF ALL. WHAT THE SHELL IS A 'FRENCH'. AND WHY DOES IT CONJURE THOUGHTS ABOUT SOMETHING CEASING TO BE ANNOYING.
SECOND OF ALL. INKLING FINGERS ARE JAGGED AND HORRIBLE, I THINK YOU'LL FIND. BUT WHATEVER. LOOK ALL YOU WANT.
THIRD. AND MOST IMPORTANTLY. YOUR JAGGED, HORRIBLE FINGERS ARE WAY TOO SHITTY TO REALLY DISCERN ANYTHING ABOUT THEM. SO THERE'S NO POINT. LOOKS LIKE YOU'LL JUST HAVE TO MOVE ON.

title: UA: SCREAM.
prattle: OH MY COD. AND JUST WHAT THE SHELL ARE YOU SCREAMING ABOUT.

WELL, WHATEVER. YOU GET IT ALL OUT OF YOUR SYSTEM, YOU GUESS. NOT THAT THAT REALLY MEANS MUCH BESIDES PUTTING YOUR HEART WAVE WHATEVER THING INTO A TIZZY, WHICH DOESN'T SEEM TO BE CAUSING ANY OTHER PROBLEMS. IT'S EVEN MAXING OUT YOUR OVATION SCORE FOR SOME REASON. SO GO AHEAD, SCREAM ALL YOU LIKE.

title: UA: also can you do that thing. With the ink
prattle: YOU CEASE YOUR HYSTERICAL DALLYING AND GET BACK TO THE MATTER AT HAND. UNFORTUNATELY, YOU'VE STILL GOT INK TANK PROBLEMS.

'WOW, THIS IS SO TERRIBLE,' YOU THINK TO YOURSELF. 'IF ONLY THERE WERE SOMETHING I COULD UNLOCK USING THIS KEY I'M HOLDING,' YOU CONTINUE. 'PERHAPS EVEN SOMETHING WHICH HAS BEEN USED IN A SIMILAR CAPACITY BEFORE,' YOU NEEDLESSLY OVERCLARIFY. 'THAT WOULD SURE BE GREAT,' YOU CONCLUDE.

title: UA: Go back to the other room
prattle: YOU RETURN TO THE OTHER ROOM. YOU'RE KIND OF SURPRISED THERE WEREN'T ANY OBNOXIOUS REVELATIONS BLOCKING YOU. LIKE THE WINDOW TURNS OUT TO BE FAKE. OR WE SUDDENLY CUT TO UNIVERSE CHARLIE OR SOMETHING. BUT I SUPPOSE WE ALL GET LUCKY SOMETIMES.

title: UA: Slowly spread the ink from the window to the wall above the stairs.
prattle: What ink?

You mean the ink you soaked up with your INVISIBLE HAMMER just now? Which is why it's slightly more visible again? Yeah, that happened, not that you can remember doing that, but not remembering things isn't exactly new for you.
So whatever. It's not as if anything around you changed just now. Besides your CONSTRIFICATION COMPASS, of course, but who even knows what the shell that's supposed to mean.
